getFile(uint256).details: Returns all file info given file index in fileMap.

params._index: - index of registered file in fileMap.

getFile(uint256).return: creator The address of file creator.fileHash The file hash.timestamp The timestamp of file registry saved in blockchain.

getFileIndexByFileHash(string).details: Shortcut function to read a file's index by its hash.

params._user: - indexes of registered file in userMap.

registerFile(string).details: Registers a file hash to contract.
